channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description:
Hi, basically when people logout on my server they can't connect? It hasn't been hapening a very long time it started happening on a small scale i.e. 1 person when 30 where on, now it seems to be happening alot. People are having issues connecting yet it still remains at 100% uptime on Moparscape status pages etc. They can only reconnect when i restart the server manually (sometimes).
This is 317, based of old dds-specz v1.5, Any help would be appreciated. And i haven't edited anything to do with the Login really.

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Could you post your login method, seems to me that when the server gets X amount of players the server gets clogged with to much information, thus forcing players to get rejected by the server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@loved wrote:

hmm can you show me your login methods.
